name: APPLE INC., petitioner, v. Robert PEPPER, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
APPLE INC., petitioner,
v.
Robert PEPPER, et al.
attorneys: Motion of ACT The App Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted.
casebody.head_matter:
APPLE INC., petitioner,
v.
Robert PEPPER, et al.
No. 17-204.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 18, 2018.
Motion of ACT The App Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted.
